articles.title: Macron says US made ‘good decision’ to lift limits on Ukraine missile use - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: France says it is Moscow, not Washington, that is upping the ante.
articles.content: The Kremlin's spokesperson Dmitry Peskov had earlier said the use of American weapons to attack targets in Russia constituted "a qualitatively new situation in terms of the involvement of the United … [+794 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Meta brings certain AI features to Ray-Ban Meta glasses in Europe - TechCrunch
articles.description: Meta is bringing certain AI features to its Meta Ray-Ban AR glasses in France, Italy, and Spain after a brief delay.
articles.content:
After a brief delay, Meta says that it’s begun to roll out certain AI features to users of its Ray-Ban Meta AR glasses in France, Italy, and Spain.
